name: Silver Dragon Wyrmling
description: A medium silver dragon with scales that reflect light like tarnished metal, showcasing an inherent majesty mixed with ferocity.
memorable: Possesses both Frost Breath and Paralyzing Breath, making it a versatile threat in combat.
goals: Typically seeks to defend its territory and assert dominance over weaker creatures.
relations: May be encountered alongside other metallic dragons or be part of a draconic kin group.
environment: Commonly found in mountainous regions or areas with cold climates.
strengths: Highly mobile due to its flying speed, along with strong breath weapons that can incapacitate or severely damage multiple foes.
weaknesses: Relatively low Constitution compared to larger dragons but still more durable than many creatures of its size.
attacks: Makes a powerful bite attack for piercing damage and can strike with claw attacks, utilizing both melee and breath attacks in combat.
most_powerful_ability: Can use Frost Breath to deal significant cold damage in a cone, alongside its Paralyzing Breath to incapacitate foes.
senses: Possesses blindsight for up to 10 feet, allowing it to perceive creatures in close proximity without sight.
skills: Noteworthy stealth skill of +4 makes it adept at moving quietly and remaining unnoticed.
additional_information: Has a special ability called Cloud Strider, allowing it to resist high altitude effects.
Can use its wings to control the battlefield.
Shows inherent draconic majesty with a strong Charisma score.
Capable of performing both physical melee and magical breath attacks.
test_queries: cold damage dragon with high mobility
young dragon with powerful melee attacks
